biotools.summary: CoreCruncher is a Fast and Robust Construction of Core Genomes in Large Prokaryotic Data Sets. CoreCruncher is a program that robustly and rapidly constructs core genomes across hundreds or thousands of genomes. CoreCruncher does not compute all pairwise genome comparisons and uses a heuristic based on the distributions of identity scores to classify sequences as orthologs or paralogs/xenologs.
